    • waitStatus

      static boolean waitStatus(long timeout, TimeUnit unit, Condition condition) throws InterruptedException
      Wait for timeout on condition
      参数:
      timeout - - the amount of time in units to wait
      unit - - the time unit
      condition - - condition to wait for
      返回:
      boolean - true if status was detected
      抛出:
      InterruptedException - - on interrupt
